creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
Roadmap: milestone 1.0

Gregor "we had crashing bugs with DOM4J which we were able to work around, so 
the removal of DOM4J (and replacement by better alternatives) has a lower 
priority now.
the rest of the DOM4J will go away when XPS disappears
